$description: Vanilla Mantine dark theme semantic colors. Default Mantine values with dark background color adjustments. Primary shade is 8 for dark theme (lighter than light theme's 6).

color.$description: Mantine default semantic color assignments for dark theme.

text.$description: Default Mantine text color for dark theme (light gray).

body.$description: Default Mantine body background color for dark theme.

bright.$description: Default Mantine bright text color for maximum contrast in dark theme.

placeholder.$description: Default Mantine placeholder text color for dark theme.

anchor.$description: Default Mantine anchor/link color for dark theme (lighter shade).

default.$description: Default Mantine component background color for dark theme.

default-hover.$description: Default Mantine hover background color for dark theme.

default-color.$description: Default Mantine text color on default backgrounds.

default-border.$description: Default Mantine border color for dark theme.

dimmed.$description: Default Mantine dimmed/muted text color for dark theme.

disabled.$description: Default Mantine disabled background color for dark theme.

disabled-color.$description: Default Mantine disabled text color for dark theme.

disabled-border.$description: Default Mantine disabled border color for dark theme.

primary.$description: Mantine primary color system for dark theme. Primary shade is 8 (lighter than light theme).

light-color.$description: Text color on primary light backgrounds.

contrast.$description: Contrast text color on primary filled backgrounds.
